channel.title: Grand Idea Turbo [3/9] - N3 - Wazza, Amelia, and Italy (The Mafia) Win!
channel.description:
### Gameplay
Days will be 7 minutes long. Nights will be 5 minutes long.
If scum have no abilities that can kill, they will have a factional kill that a player can perform in place of their night abilities. ### Executions
To accuse someone say **/vote [player]** This game will have Majority and Plurality
### Logs
Anyone may leave logs if they wish ### To Join
To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like “I want to join” or “/join” or “/in” or “sign me up, coach” or whatever you want
### Rolelist:
(For 7 players) 5 **Town** 2 **Non-town**(at least 1 groupscum)
(For 8 players) 6 **Town** 2 **Groupscum**
(For 9 Players) 7 **Town** 2 **Non-town**(at least 1 groupscum with conversion)
# Playerlist 1. Priestess 2. SirDerpsAlot 3. Amelia 4. Jane 5. ModeShifter 6. Ici 7. PKR 8. Ob_Light 9. EVO
# Game ideally starts [date=2020-04-29 time=13:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"]

item.title: Grand Idea Turbo [3/9] - N3 - Wazza, Amelia, and Italy (The Mafia) Win!
item.dc:creator: Wazza
item.description:
Europe split apart from the rest of the world and went missing.

USA and China managed to find them and to get on the land they went to war with Ukraine and split the land.
Russia fell and the Soviet Union returned, along with Japan and Canada.

There are some other mysterious countries that are hiding in there also it’s just currently a wasteland :^)

Read full topic
